scripts.start: npm run build:dev && npx servor . index.html 8080 --reload
scripts.build: mkdir -p public && npx esbuild index.tsx --bundle --minify --sourcemap --jsx=automatic --outfile=public/index.js --loader:.tsx=tsx --loader:.ts=ts --platform=browser --define:process.env.NODE_ENV=\"production\" && cp index.html public/index.html
scripts.sync: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
scripts.run:ios: npm run sync && npx cap run ios
scripts.deploy: npm run sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.pod:fix: cd ios/App && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock && pod repo remove master || true && pod repo add-cdn trunk https://cdn.cocoapods.org/ || true && export GIT_SSL_NO_VERIFY=true && pod install
